plot: Three Tamagotchi children playing spaceship suddenly go missing, and the suspicions are that they began playing more than just a game./While the Mame family is enjoying a day at the ice ...
title: "Tamagotchi!" Pipopapo! Tamagotchi hoshi seifuku?/Kirân! Lovelyn hyôjô ni mau
